title.narrative: Better Health for older people: reducing poverty by improving health for older people in Africa

description.narrative: Generate, document and share research and learning among CSOs, government and other stakeholders contributing to effective regional and national HIV and SP policies and programmes.
Increase access to HIV and social protection services through increased targeting of most disadvantaged groups by service providers.
Increase participation of CSOs in the formulation, implementation and monitoring of national, regional and global HIV and SP policies and strategies.
Increase the engagement with policy makers including governments at different levels.

The programme will reach more than 383,000 older people in 4 African countries (Ethiopia, Mozambique, Tanzania and Zimbabwe) to improve access and the affordability to age-appropriate health, HIV and care service.
